store.name: store
store.summary: Stores a password in the database.

arguments.name: id_option
arguments.description: option The option to which it is attached

userStore.name: userStore
userStore.summary: Stores a password in the database for a user.

get.name: get
get.summary: Returns a password for the given option.

userGet.name: userGet
userGet.summary: Returns a password for the given user's option.

delete.name: delete
delete.summary: Deletes the password for the given option.

test.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

exists.name: exists

getFields.name: getFields
getFields.summary: Returns the fields of the main table.

insert.name: insert
insert.summary: Inserts a new row in the table.

update.name: update
update.summary: Updates a single row in the table through its id.

selectOne.name: selectOne
selectOne.summary: Retrieves a row as an object from the table through its id.

select.name: select
select.summary: Retrieves a row as an object from the table through its id.

rselect.name: rselect
rselect.summary: Retrieves a row as an array from the table through its id.

count.name: count
count.summary: Returns the number of rows from the table for the given conditions.

selectAll.name: selectAll
selectAll.summary: Returns an array of rows as objects from the table for the given conditions.

rselectAll.name: rselectAll
rselectAll.summary: Returns an array of rows as arrays from the table for the given conditions.
